nodes.text: A Rodian harvest festival was a ceremony within the culture of the Rodian species. During the Galactic War between the Galactic Republic and the reconstituted Sith Empire, the Ceremony, Gala, and Ritual droid CGR-80 was hired to preside over a harvest festival.

Rodian harvest festivals were first mentioned in the conversation "A Modest Proposal" with Doc, a companion character for the Jedi Knight class in the 2011 BioWare video game Star Wars: The Old Republic, though no further information was given on the ceremony.
